mapper.select: select count(*) from player_record
SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.goals_for as "goals_for" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no ORDER BY p.goals_for DESC
SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.wins as "wins" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no ORDER BY p.wins DESC
SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.goals_assist as "goals_assist" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no ORDER BY p.goals_assist DESC

select m.nickname AS "nickname", p.games_played as "games_played", p.wins as "wins", p.draws as "draws", p.losses as "losses", p.goals_for as "goals_for", p.goals_assist as "goals_assist", s.name AS "region" from member m, player_record p, sido s where 1=1 and p.player = m.m_no and m.sido_id = s.sido_id
AND m.sido_id = 9
AND (m.sido_id = 2 or m.sido_id = 11)
AND m.sido_id = 1
AND (m.sido_id = 7 or m.sido_id = 15 or m.sido_id = 16)
AND (m.sido_id = 5 or m.sido_id = 12 or m.sido_id = 13)
AND (m.sido_id = 3 or m.sido_id = 4 or m.sido_id = 6 or m.sido_id = 8 or m.sido_id = 10)
AND m.sido_id = 14
ORDER BY games_played DESC
ORDER BY ${sortTabRegion}
select count(*) from player_record

SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.goals_for as "goals_for" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no
AND m.sido_id = 9
AND (m.sido_id = 9 or m.sido_id = 11)
AND m.sido_id = 1
AND (m.sido_id = 7 or m.sido_id = 15 or m.sido_id = 16)
AND (m.sido_id = 5 or m.sido_id = 12 or m.sido_id = 13)
AND (m.sido_id = 3 or m.sido_id = 4 or m.sido_id = 6 or m.sido_id = 8 or m.sido_id = 10)
AND m.sido_id = 14
ORDER BY p.goals_for DESC

SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.wins as "wins" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no
AND m.sido_id = 9
AND (m.sido_id = 9 or m.sido_id = 11)
AND m.sido_id = 1
AND (m.sido_id = 7 or m.sido_id = 15 or m.sido_id = 16)
AND (m.sido_id = 5 or m.sido_id = 12 or m.sido_id = 13)
AND (m.sido_id = 3 or m.sido_id = 4 or m.sido_id = 6 or m.sido_id = 8 or m.sido_id = 10)
AND m.sido_id = 14
ORDER BY p.wins DESC

SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.goals_assist as "goals_assist" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no
AND m.sido_id = 9
AND (m.sido_id = 2 or m.sido_id = 11)
AND m.sido_id = 1
AND (m.sido_id = 7 or m.sido_id = 15 or m.sido_id = 16)
AND (m.sido_id = 5 or m.sido_id = 12 or m.sido_id = 13)
AND (m.sido_id = 3 or m.sido_id = 4 or m.sido_id = 6 or m.sido_id = 8 or m.sido_id = 10)
AND m.sido_id = 14
ORDER BY p.goals_assist DESC

select m.nickname AS "nickname", p.games_played as "games_played", p.wins as "wins", p.draws as "draws", p.losses as "losses", p.goals_for as "goals_for", p.goals_assist as "goals_assist", m.gender as "gender" from member m, player_record p where 1=1 and p.player = m.m_no
and m.gender='${gender}'
order by games_played desc
order by ${sortTabGender}
select count(*) from player_record

SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.goals_for as "goals_for" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no
and m.gender='${gender}'
ORDER BY p.goals_for DESC

SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.wins as "wins" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no
and m.gender='${gender}'
ORDER BY p.wins DESC

SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.goals_assist as "goals_assist" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no
and m.gender='${gender}'
ORDER BY p.goals_assist DESC

select m.nickname AS "nickname", p.games_played as "games_played", p.wins as "wins", p.draws as "draws", p.losses as "losses", p.goals_for as "goals_for", p.goals_assist as "goals_assist", m.birthdate as "birthdate" from member m, player_record p where 1=1 and p.player = m.m_no
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 10 AND 19)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 20 AND 29)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 30 AND 39)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 40 AND 49)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 50 AND 59)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 60 AND 69)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 70 AND 79)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 80 AND 89)
order by games_played desc
order by ${sortTabAge}
select count(*) from player_record

SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.goals_for as "goals_for" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 10 AND 19)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 20 AND 29)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 30 AND 39)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 40 AND 49)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 50 AND 59)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 60 AND 69)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 70 AND 79)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 80 AND 89)
ORDER BY p.goals_for DESC

SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.wins as "wins" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 10 AND 19)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 20 AND 29)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 30 AND 39)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 40 AND 49)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 50 AND 59)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 60 AND 69)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 70 AND 79)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 80 AND 89)
ORDER BY p.wins DESC

SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", p.goals_assist as "goals_assist" FROM member m, player_record p where p.player = m.m_no
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 10 AND 19)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 20 AND 29)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 30 AND 39)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 40 AND 49)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 50 AND 59)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 60 AND 69)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 70 AND 79)
AND ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 80 AND 89)
ORDER BY p.goals_assist DESC

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY') = '2000' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_2000", SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY') = '2005' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_2005", SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY') = '2010' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_2010", SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY') = '2015' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_2015", SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY') = '2020' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_2020", SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY') = '2024' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_2024" FROM member

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN sido_id = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_gangwondo", SUM(CASE WHEN sido_id = 2 or sido_id = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_gyeonggido", SUM(CASE WHEN sido_id = 3 or sido_id = 4 or sido_id = 6 or sido_id = 8 or sido_id = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_gyeongsangdo", SUM(CASE WHEN sido_id = 5 or sido_id = 12 or sido_id = 13 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_gyeongsangdo", SUM(CASE WHEN sido_id = 7 or sido_id = 15 or sido_id = 16 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_chungcheongdo", SUM(CASE WHEN sido_id = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_seoul", SUM(CASE WHEN sido_id = 14 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_jejudo" FROM member
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN gender = '남' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_men", SUM(CASE WHEN gender = '여' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_women" FROM member

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 10 AND 19) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_10", SUM(CASE WHEN ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 20 AND 29) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_20", SUM(CASE WHEN ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 30 AND 39) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_30", SUM(CASE WHEN ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 40 AND 49) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_40", SUM(CASE WHEN ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 50 AND 59) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_50", SUM(CASE WHEN ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 60 AND 69) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_60", SUM(CASE WHEN ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 70 AND 79) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_70", SUM(CASE WHEN ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(birthdate, 'YYYY'))) BETWEEN 80 AND 89) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "count_80" FROM member
